Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Documentary papyrus
Description: Documentary papyrus, probably the remains of an administrative correspondence that dealt with the enactment of a lawsuit of a family nature (mention of "paira" (children) in line 3 and of the father in line 4). A connection is possible with the subject of the P. Lille 100 (a)
